name: Lights of Hope
description:
Lights of Hope is a minimalist, fast-paced, difficult action game. The player plays in their own mind, and the enemies are actually their problems. There is also the root of the problems which spawns the others. The player must avoid attacks of problems and destroy the root. Developed for PC platform with Unity game engine.

We started this project at a 48-hour game jam event "Takeaway Jam" organized by ITU Game Design and Development Club on February 19-21, 2021. #takeaway-jam

--- Controls ---

Use WASD or arrow buttons to navigate around the field. 

Use mouse left button to teleport over lights of hope.

Use mouse right button to parry enemies' attacks.

--- Team ---

The whole game is developed by me.
